Posts.Content: Just show what the power of Facebook can do, Im 35 and was diagnosed on the 23 of January with breast cancer and did a selfie with my hat off as my of my family and friends had not seen me with out my hat, I had great support from my friend with nearly 300 like and 130 comment with lots of love hug and support. Linda
Posts.Title: Selfies and donations

Posts.Content: Hi Anne I to love to see the sun, but have been told to put at lest factor 30 on every day even if it's not that sunny. Linda
Posts.Title: SUNSHINE!
